dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.log

Class APIException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.log.APIException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CDSGenAPIException, CtxtException, ProjectException

    public class APIException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    All Exceptions thrown by the Public API inherit from this this Exception. This exception is a RuntimeException and therefore need not explicitly be catched. If APIExceptions a thrown is controlled via the Options class.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.a
